definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: His electrocardiograms (ECGs) recorded during attack showed ventricular tachycardia.
sentences.chinese: 心电图显示为心室频脉。

sentences.english: Methods Subjects from 5 LQTS underwent clinical examination including resting body surface ECG.
sentences.chinese: 方法5个家系的成员行临床检查，采集静息心电图。

sentences.english: Electrocardiographic abnormality was associated with the degree of clinical condition and prognosis.
sentences.chinese: 心电图异常与病情轻重及预后密切相关。

sentences.english: Method Trace back and analyze ECG of 50 cases of IPS.
sentences.chinese: 回顾性分析50例间歇性预激综合征的心电图。

sentences.english: An electrocardiogram and echocardiogram showed no compromise of cardiac functions.
sentences.chinese: 心电图和超声心动图检查显示心脏功能无损害。

sentences.english: While ECG(Electro Cardio Gram) is one of the most important tools for detecting cardio-system diseases today.
sentences.chinese: 诊断心脏疾病的最重要工具之一是心电图检测。

sentences.english: Children patients having anthracene nucleus chemotherapeutics should be monitored with cardiogram frequently.
sentences.chinese: 蒽环类抗肿瘤药物用于儿童患者时应密切监测心电图。

sentences.english: Use of limb lead or single lead thoracic placement electrocardiograms resulted in some loss of specificity.
sentences.chinese: 用肢导联或单用胸导联的心电图可致特异性更低。

sentences.english: The diagnosis was mainly based on electrocardiogram and echocardiogram.
sentences.chinese: 心电图及超声心动图是正确诊断的重要方法。

sentences.english: The standard speed for the paper of the electrocardiograph is 50mm per second.
sentences.chinese: 心电图记录纸的标准速度为每秒50毫米。

sentences.english: A new microcomputerized Fetal Electrocardiograph (FECG) is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍一种微机化胎儿心电图仪。

sentences.english: Objectives To evaluate the value of emergency ECG for the forecast of hyperkalemia.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解急诊心电图对高钾血症的快速评价作用。

sentences.english: Electrocardiographic changes in neurovascular disease are not rare.
sentences.chinese: 在神经血管疾病中发现的心电图变化并非少见。

sentences.english: ECG and phonocardiogram were recorded by synchronization.
sentences.chinese: 整个检查过程同步记录心电图及心音图。

sentences.english: Electrocardiograph is an importance diagnostic tool to the heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 心电图仪是心血管疾病的重要诊断工具。

sentences.english: ConclusionElectrocardiogram can be used as a judgment index with Cortex Periplocae poisoning in guinea pigs.
sentences.chinese: 结论豚鼠心电图可以作为香加皮中毒的判断依据。

definition: atrial fibrillation (abbr. for 心房顫動|心房颤动[xin1 fang2 chan4 dong4])
